Class ListArrayBased<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListArrayBased<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListInterface<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListArrayBasedPlusN

    public class ListArrayBased<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ListInterface<T>
    Array-based implementation of the ADT list, implments ListInterface. Holds a generic variable of any type. Has a data field of type int[] items to hold all items in list, and int numItems to track the number of items in the list.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ListArrayBased

        public ListArrayBased()
        Constructor for list. Takes in no parameters and sets the array list to an empty list of size 3, and sets numItems data field to 0

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Method to get if list is empty. Checks if numItems data field is equal to 0. Returns true if empty, false if not.
        Specified by:
        isEmpty in interface ListInterface<T>
        Returns:
        boolean of if numItems is equal to 0.

      • size

        public int size()
        Getter method for size of list.
        Specified by:
        size in interface ListInterface<T>
        Returns:
        numItems -- int type that tracks amount of items in list.

      • removeAll

        public void removeAll()
        Method that clears all values from list. Resets items array back to an empty list of size 3, and resets numItems to 0.
        Specified by:
        removeAll in interface ListInterface<T>

      • add

        public void add(int index,
                T item)
         throws ListIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Method to add an item to the list. Takes in item to add and what index to add it to. If list is full, it will throw and error. Else, it will add to the correct index, and shift all values to the right of the desgnated index to avoid overwritting current values in the list. If adds, updates numItems size tracker by one.
        Specified by:
        add in interface ListInterface<T>
        Parameters:
        index - -- int type of where to add item in list
        item - -- Generic type of what to be added to list
        Throws:
        ListIndexOutOfBoundsException

      • get

        public T get(int index)
      throws ListIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Method to get the genreic item at a given index of the list from the parameter. Confirms the index provided to retrieve from is valid. If valid, find item at index, else, throw exception.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ListInterface<T>
        Parameters:
        index - -- int type to describe index from where to retrieve in list.
        Returns:
        item -- Generic Type of desired item being stored in list.
        Throws:
        ListIndexOutOfBoundsException

      • remove

        public void remove(int index)
            throws ListIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Method to remove and item from the list based on given index from parameter input. Validates index, and if a valid index for array, delete value by shifting and overwriting the desired deleted value at given index input as parameter. Reduces counter for numItems which tracks amount of items in list. If index is invalid, throws ListException.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface ListInterface<T>
        Parameters:
        index - -- int type that is used to specify what index to delete from.
        Throws:
        ListIndexOutOfBoundsException
